attributes.title: How Spiritual Powers remove Depression from Your Life
attributes.description: In this short video, Paramahamsa Nithyananda connects the significance of spiritual powers to removing depression from your life. He explains: whether we feel depressed or not has to do with the amount of contact we are having with life. For many people, that contact point is just a needle point. When even that goes, we feel depressed. With spiritual powers, our cognition of us changes. Paramahamsa Nithyananda tells of his own experience as a child, that after applying the spiritual powers a few times, all insecurity left him, the contact point with life increased and feeling secure with life happened for him. In this video, Paramahamsa Nithyananda explains enlightenment as the moment where our contact point with life has become full skin surface level. Because of spiritual powers manifesting in our lives, our love for life and Guru (who is our connection to life) drastically increases.
